text:
I produced a test web application to test that static and dynamic resources 
contained under the WEB-INF directory were protected. This test was successful, 
however, trying to include or forward to a static resource under the WEB-INF 
directory using the foward and include actions returned no content.

For example:

<jsp:forward page="/WEB-INF/jsp/forward/two.html"/>

This resulted in an empty page being retured to the browser.

<jsp:include page="/WEB-INF/jsp/include/foo.html" flush="true"/>

Where the include statement appeared nothing had been included in the ouput.

I have a small web application which is a variation of your forward and include 
JSP examples (security.war 4K) that I can email to you to demonstrate the 
problem.
creator: McConchieD@Logica.com
McConchieD@Logica.com
text:
Created attachment 104
Test case web application demonstrating problem.

creator: marc.saegesser@apropos.com
text:
I tried the attached web application on both 3.2.1 and 3.2.2 and could not 
duplicate the problem behaviour.  If you can still reproduce the problem please 
let me know.
